subject: Shipping problem
description_text:
Hello again. Today I wanted to check on   *#SSN2965* shipping status but
got the message "System automatic payment deduction failed. Reason: No
available payment method". I didn't get any withdrawals from my credit card
and there were no mails from Alibaba Logistics. Is it normal or are there
any additional fees I have to pay?

conversations.body_text: Hi bubub,    Please don't worry, we've already paid for it. The package will be shipped out soon.
